main event: LT COL H. GORDON ALLEY, 1ST WEATHER SQUADRON, WALKER AFB, NM, REPORTED SEEING A BRIGHT LIGHT MOVING ERRATICALLY IN THE SKY.
interesting points: The object was reported by a lieutenant colonel in the U.S. Air Force,The sighting occurred on June 4, 1954,The object was described as a bright light,The object exhibited erratic movement,The case was classified as 'unidentified' and closed.
sighted object: a bright light in the sky
witness description: H. Gordon Alley, LT COL, USAF
